flawed_nl_solution:
In five years, Angelina will be 40 years old, meaning currently she is 40-5 = <<40-5=35>>35 years old.
Since Angelina is 35 years old right now, and she is four years older than Justin, it means Justin is 35-4 = <<35-4=13>>13 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 31, not 13. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
